title: Letterpress Grotesque
content:
Hello Everybody,  
any ideas if there is a digital version of this lovely Grotesque?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007164214im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/sv_006_hillmehlpackung_3568.jpg)

 [‹ Beeline Slab Serif profile typeface](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007164214/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43779 "Go to previous forum topic") [Low Res ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007164214/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43788 "Go to next forum topic")
author: xyz.ch

comments.content: As are [FF Bau](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007164214/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_bau/) and [Venus](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007164214/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/scangraphic/venus_sb/). In fact, judging by the 2, this is a metal Venus.
Though neither comes close to that lovely ’E’, or the ’G’?
Font Bureau’s Vonnes has that E & similar G.
Thank you for all the inputs – I guess its a real lead original and neighter Vonnes nor the FF Fonts are exactly that one. I do like the FF Bau a lot, didntt know that one.
